headline.print_headline: 'Miracle On Ice' Member Bob Suter Dies
headline.main: 'Miracle On Ice' Member Bob Suter Dies

docs.snippet: Bob Suter, a member of the "Miracle On Ice" team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1980 and the father of Minnesota Wild star Ryan Suter, died Tuesday at the age of 57....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bob Suter, a member of the "Miracle On Ice" team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1980 and the father of Minnesota Wild star Ryan Suter, died Tuesday at the age of 57.

headline.print_headline: Judge Won't Release Any Brown Juvenile Records
headline.main: Judge Won't Release Any Brown Juvenile Records

docs.snippet: A judge has denied a request to release any juvenile records of an unarmed 18-year-old shot to death last month by police....
docs.lead_paragraph: A judge has denied a request to release any juvenile records of an unarmed 18-year-old shot to death last month by police.

headline.print_headline: World Trade Center Complex on Way to Completion
headline.main: World Trade Center Complex on Way to Completion

docs.snippet: Thirteen years after 9/11 forever changed the New York skyline, officials say most work at the World Trade Center complex is on track and on budget....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thirteen years after 9/11 forever changed the New York skyline, officials say most work at the World Trade Center complex is on track and on budget.

headline.print_headline: Ackman Urges Allergan Board to 'Wake Up' on Valeant Talks
headline.main: Ackman Urges Allergan Board to 'Wake Up' on Valeant Talks

docs.snippet: After months of staying largely silent on a deal he is trying to broker, billionaire William Ackman on Tuesday criticized Allergan Inc 's board of directors, urging them to "wake up" and at least listen to what potential purchaser Valeant Pharmace...
docs.lead_paragraph: After months of staying largely silent on a deal he is trying to broker, billionaire William Ackman on Tuesday criticized Allergan Inc 's board of directors, urging them to "wake up" and at least listen to what potential purchaser Valeant Pharmaceuticals has to offer the Botox maker.

headline.print_headline: Blast at German Chemical Plant Damages Nearby Buildings
headline.main: Blast at German Chemical Plant Damages Nearby Buildings

docs.snippet: A blast hit a northern Germany chemical plant in the city of Ritterhude late Tuesday and damaged several nearby buildings, police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A blast hit a northern Germany chemical plant in the city of Ritterhude late Tuesday and damaged several nearby buildings, police said.

headline.print_headline: Cougar That Injured Boy in California Tracked for Third Day
headline.main: Cougar That Injured Boy in California Tracked for Third Day

docs.snippet: Game wardens and hounds combed steep, wooded canyons and ravines for a third day near California's Silicon Valley on Tuesday, searching for a mountain lion that injured a 6-year-old boy, but the cat has so far evaded trackers, wildlife officials s...
docs.lead_paragraph: Game wardens and hounds combed steep, wooded canyons and ravines for a third day near California's Silicon Valley on Tuesday, searching for a mountain lion that injured a 6-year-old boy, but the cat has so far evaded trackers, wildlife officials said.

docs.snippet: In an interview with David Carr, the executive editor talked about his career, the perils of war reporting, dealings with the government and other issues....
docs.abstract: In an interview with David Carr, the executive editor talked about his career, the perils of war reporting, dealings with the government and other issues.

headline.print_headline: Oregon Nurse Pleads Guilty to Sexually Abusing Emergency Room Patients
headline.main: Oregon Nurse Pleads Guilty to Sexually Abusing Emergency Room Patients

docs.snippet: An Oregon nurse pleaded guilty on Tuesday to sexually abusing women in a Portland hospital's emergency room and is expected to be sentenced to 15 years in prison under terms of a deal with prosecutors, a court administrator said....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Oregon nurse pleaded guilty on Tuesday to sexually abusing women in a Portland hospital's emergency room and is expected to be sentenced to 15 years in prison under terms of a deal with prosecutors, a court administrator said.

headline.print_headline: Security Clearance Contractor to Lose Gov't Work
headline.main: Security Clearance Contractor to Lose Gov't Work

docs.snippet: The federal Office of Personnel Management plans to terminate its massive contracts with USIS, the major security clearance contractor that was targeted last month by a cyberattack, agency, congressional and company officials said Tuesday. The com...
docs.lead_paragraph: The federal Office of Personnel Management plans to terminate its massive contracts with USIS, the major security clearance contractor that was targeted last month by a cyberattack, agency, congressional and company officials said Tuesday. The computer network intrusion compromised the personal files of as many as 25,000 government workers.

headline.print_headline: Teen Pleads Guilty in Fatal Shootings of 3 Youths
headline.main: Teen Pleads Guilty in Fatal Shootings of 3 Youths

docs.snippet: A teenage boy has pleaded guilty to fatally shooting three other youths on a New Jersey street on Christmas night last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: A teenage boy has pleaded guilty to fatally shooting three other youths on a New Jersey street on Christmas night last year.
